article.title: U.S. Air Force Awards GPS Systems Engineering and Integration Contract
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: The SI Organization Inc., King of Prussia, Pa., was awarded an $83,748,017 multiple-type contract including cost-plus-incentive-fee and firm-fixed-price for systems engineering and integration (SE&I) technical support. This contract provides for SE&I for the GPS Enterprise system of stems that are composed of three product segments that are a space segment, a control segment and a user segment. The Air Force Space and Missile Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, Calif., is the contracting activity (FA8807-14-C-0001).
